## remove any potential lingering objects and data from RStudio when running a new script
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```

## declare root directory and folder structure
```{r}
project.folder <- paste0(here::here(),'/')
source(paste0(project.folder,'create_folder_structure.R'))
```

## Which R version am I using?
```{r}
print(R.Version())
```

## Plot something in R
```{r}
set.seed(1)
x=rnorm(100); y = rnorm(100)
plot(x,y)
```

## Plot something in R using ggplot
```{r}
data = data.frame(x,y)

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data) + 
  geom_point(aes(x=x,y=y)) +
  theme_classic()
```
